title: Executive Order 13666-Expanding Eligibility for the Defense Meritorious Service Medal
content: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered as follows:

Executive Order 12019 of November 3, 1977 (Establishing the Defense Meritorious Service Medal), is amended by inserting ", or to any member of the armed forces of a friendly foreign nation," after "any member of the Armed Forces of the United States".
citation: Barack Obama, Executive Order 13666-Expanding Eligibility for the Defense Meritorious Service Medal Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/305057
